```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(crosstalk)
library(DT)

```

```{r}
library(readr)
earthquakedata <- read_csv("data/earthquakedata.csv")

```


# Estatico {data-icon=fa-chalkboard}

## row


###
```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  DT::datatable()
```



###
```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, 
             lat = ~lat, 
             label = ~yr)

```



# Dinamico (crosstalk) {data-icon=fa-rocket}


```{r}
data_share <- SharedData$new(

  filter(yr > 2000)
  )
```
